Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Votes.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Title: Increases the penalties for operating a snowmobile while intoxicated
Summary: Increases the penalties for operating a snowmobile while intoxicated, doubles penalties for operators having .16 of one per centum or more by weight of alcohol in their blood, breath, urine, or saliva, and includes other operating while intoxicated convictions in sentencing considerations.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to increasing the penalties for operating a snowmobile while intoxicated
